languages.text: "А если тебя интересует эта малышка," {n}— механическая ладонь сжимается в кулак перед вашим лицом, —{/n} "все просто — ксеносы. Тупоголовые зеленые орки... Эх, кто ж знал, что на обломки Имперского рейдера претендуем не только мы? Непросто быть хладным торговцем".

"And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."
languages.original_text: "А если тебя интересует эта малышка," {n}— механическая ладонь сжимается в кулак перед вашим лицом, —{/n} "все просто — ксеносы. Тупоголовые зеленые орки... Эх, кто ж знал, что на обломки Имперского рейдера претендуем не только мы? Непросто быть хладным торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "And if you are interested in this baby," {n}the mechanical palm balls into a fist in front of your face,{/n}" the answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of an Imperial raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And if you are interested in this baby," {n}the mechanical palm balls into a fist in front of your face,{/n}" the answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of an Imperial raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of an Imperial raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

traits.locale_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of an Imperial raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

languages.text: “如果你对这件宝贝感兴趣的话……”{n}婕伊将机械手握成了拳头。{/n}“是异形干的，是那群呆头呆脑的绿色兽人……谁能想得到，当时除了我们之外，还有别人被那艘掠袭者战机的残骸吸引过去呢？冷市商人的生活充满了危险。”
languages.original_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

traits.locale_text: “如果你对这件宝贝感兴趣的话……”{n}婕伊将机械手握成了拳头。{/n}“着是异形干的，是那群呆头呆脑的绿色兽人……谁能想得到，当时除了我们之外，还有别人被那艘帝国掠袭者战机的残骸吸引过去呢？冷市商人的生活充满了危险。”
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

languages.original_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

languages.text: «Y si le intriga esta preciosidad...». {n}La mano mecánica forma un puño delante de tu cara.{/n} «La respuesta es xenos. Estúpidos Orkos de cara verde... ¿Cómo íbamos a saber que les interesaban los restos de un incursor? El Comercio Frío está lleno de peligros».
languages.original_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

traits.locale_text: «Y si le intriga esta preciosidad...». {n}La mano mecánica forma un puño delante de tu cara.{/n} «La respuesta es xenos. Estúpidos orkos caraverde... ¿Cómo íbamos a saber que les interesaban los restos de un incursor imperial? El Comercio Frío está lleno de peligros».
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、もしアンタがこの赤子に興味があるってのなら…」{n}機械の手があなたの顔の前で拳を握る。{/n}「答えは異種族だ。愚かな緑のオルクだ…あの襲撃船の残骸に誘引されるのは俺らだけじゃないってことさ。闇商人の人生は危険に満ちているんだ」
languages.original_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、もしアンタがこの赤子に興味があるってのなら…」{n}機械の手があなたの顔の前で拳を握る。{/n}「答えは異種族だ。愚かな緑のオルクだ…あの襲撃船の残骸に誘引されるのは俺らだけじゃないってことさ。闇商人の人生は危険に満ちているんだ」
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

languages.text: "Und wenn Ihr an diesem Baby interessiert seid ..." {n}Die mechanische Hand ballt sich vor deinem Gesicht zu einer Faust.{/n} "Die Antwort lautet Xenos. Dämliche grüne Orks ... Wer hätte gedacht, dass wir nicht die Einzigen sind, die von dem Wrack dieses Raiders angelockt werden? Das Leben eines Kalthändlers ist voller Gefahren."
languages.original_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

traits.locale_text: "Und wenn Ihr an diesem Baby interessiert seid ..." {n}Die mechanische Hand ballt sich vor deinem Gesicht zu einer Faust.{/n} "Die Antwort lautet Xenos. Dämliche grüne Orks ... Wer hätte gedacht, dass wir nicht die Einzigen sind, die von dem Wrack eines imperialen Raiders angelockt werden? Das Leben eines Kalthändlers ist voller Gefahren."
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

languages.text: « Et si vous vous demandez à qui je dois ce petit bijou, {n}dit-elle en serrant son poing mécanique devant votre visage,{/n} ce sont les xénos que je peux remercier. Ces crétins d'Orks... Qui aurait cru que nous n'étions pas les seuls à nous intéresser à l'épave de ce croiseur ? La vie d'une adepte du Commerce Froid regorge de danger. »
languages.original_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

traits.locale_text: « Et si vous vous demandez à qui je dois ce petit bijou, {n}dit-elle en serrant son poing mécanique devant votre visage,{/n} ce sont les xénos que je peux remercier. Ces crétins d'Orks... Qui aurait cru que nous n'étions pas les seuls à nous intéresser à l'épave de ce croiseur impérial ? La vie d'une adepte du Commerce Froid regorge de danger. »
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion

languages.text: "Bu bebeği merak ediyorsan..." {n}Mekanik el, yüzünün önünde kıvrılıp yumruğa dönüşüyor.{/n} "Cevabı zenolar. Geri beyinli Orklar. Baskıncı enkazına ağzı sulanan başkaları olabileceğini kim bilebilirdi ki? Soğuk Tacirlerin hayatı tehlikelerle dolu."
languages.original_text: "And if you are interested in this baby..." {n}The mechanical hand balls into a fist in front of your face.{/n} "The answer is xenos. Dumb-headed green Orks... Who knew we weren't the only ones to be tempted by the wreck of that raider? The life of a Cold Trader is full of peril."

traits.locale_text: "Bu bebeği merak ediyorsan." {n}Mekanik el, yüzünün önünde kıvrılıp yumruğa dönüşüyor.{/n} "Cevabı zenolar. Geri beyinli Orklar. Baskıncı enkazına ağzı sulananların tek biz olmadığımızı kim bilebilirdi ki? Bir Soğuk Tacir'in yaşamı tehlikelerle dolu."
traits.speaker: SmugglerCompanion
